summary.overallFindings: Molina Healthcare demonstrates comprehensive responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with concrete public evidence for transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and external audits. The company provides detailed documentation and public communications outlining its approach to AI risk, compliance, and ethical implementation. Molina's responsible AI program is mature and operationalized, reflecting industry best practices in healthcare AI. No significant gaps were identified in the public evidence reviewed.
